org.hypknowsys.wumprep4weka.gui
Class WUMprepConfigurationCustomizer

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.hypknowsys.wumprep4weka.gui.WUMprepConfigurationCustomizer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.FocusListener, java.awt.event.ItemListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.beans.Customizer, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class WUMprepConfigurationCustomizer
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.FocusListener, java.beans.Customizer, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.awt.event.ItemListener

Provides a Customizer GUI for WUMprep configuration files represented by a WUMprepConfiguration object.

Version:
$Id: WUMprepConfigurationCustomizer.java,v 1.2 2005/09/14 19:42:57 cpohle Exp $
Author:
Carsten Pohle (cp AT cpohle de)

defaultConfig

private WUMprepConfiguration defaultConfig
Holds a default WUMprepConfiguration. The context help texts are taken from this file, because a user-provided WUMprep configuration file might contain different or no comments at all.

createComponent

private javax.swing.JComponent createComponent(java.lang.String name)
This method knows and returns for every possible WUMprep configuration setting the right input method for use in customization dialogues.

Parameters:
name - The WUMprep config file's section and setting to be edited as "section:setting"
Returns:
The JComponent to be used in a customization dialogue.

focusGained

Whenever a component named according to the scheme documented in getComponent(java.lang.String), its name is used to retrieve and display the according context help.

focusLost

public void focusLost(java.awt.event.FocusEvent e)
Whenever an editor component named according to scheme documented in getComponent(String) looses focus, its current value is stored in the underlying config.

Specified by:
focusLost in interface java.awt.event.FocusListener
See Also:
FocusListener.focusLost(java.awt.event.FocusEvent)

getComponent

private javax.swing.JComponent getComponent(java.lang.String name)
Get the JComponent holding the WUMprepConfiguration's property name exposed by the customizer.

The JComponents holding property values are named according to the scheme section:setting, referring to the section and setting lable in the WUMprep configuration file, respectively. This naming occurs during each component's initialization in createComponent(String) and getConfigFileSelectorJComponent().

Parameters:
name - The name of the JComponent to be retrieved according to the schema described above.
Returns:
The component.

getComponentValue

private java.lang.String getComponentValue(java.awt.Component comp)
Get the current String value of a customization component (e.g., a JTextField).

Parameters:
comp - The JComponent to get the value of.
Returns:
The components current value.

getComponentValue

private java.lang.String getComponentValue(java.lang.String name)
Get the current String value of a customization component (e.g., a JTextField).

Parameters:
name - The name of the JComponent to get the value of. See getComponent(String) for the documentation of the naming scheme.
Returns:
The components current value.

removeNotify

public void removeNotify()
When this customizer get's removed from its parent container, it checks wether there are unsaved changes and ask the user to save them if neccessary.

Overrides:
removeNotify in class javax.swing.JComponent
See Also:
Component.removeNotify()

saveConfig

private void saveConfig(java.lang.String filename)
Saves the current configuration into a file.

Parameters:
filename - The name of the file to save the configuration into.

saveConfig

private void saveConfig(java.lang.String filename,
                        boolean silent)
Saves the current configuration into a file.

Parameters:
filename - The name of the file to save the configuration into.
silent - Whether the use should be notified about the saving via a message box.
